short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do a DNS lookup on A,AAAA, MX,NS,TXT,SOA and SPF records

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Whois® DNS lookup app is essentially a bookmarklet for your home/starting page that will take you on our DNS lookups page, where you can do a DNS lookup(dig).

The DNS lookup tool is a hosted tool that will give you the results of a dig or DNS lookup on a given zone. Search for all records or search for a singular record. DNS record types include A, AAAA, MX, NS, TXT, SOA, and SPF.

If you don't want a bookmarklet, and would prefer to do single click dns lookups from a page that you are visiting, take a look at our DNS lookup extension for Chrome.
